Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Axicabtagene ciloleucel is approved to treat adults with:

ItemizedList.ListItem:
B-cell non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL), including the following types:diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL)DLBCL in patients who had follicular lymphomafollicular lymphoma¹primary mediastinal large B-cell lymphomahigh-grade B-cell lymphoma
It is used in adults whose cancer came back or did not get better after at least two other systemic therapies.
DLBCL that did not respond to first-line chemoimmunotherapy or that relapsed within 12 months of first-line chemoimmunotherapy

Section.Para: Axicabtagene ciloleucel is only available as part of a special program called Yescarta REMS (Risk Evaluation and Mitigation Strategies).
¹This use is approved under FDA’s Accelerated Approval Program. As a condition of approval, confirmatory trial(s) must show that axicabtagene ciloleucel provides a clinical benefit in these patients.
Axicabtagene ciloleucel is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
